root.description: A cold, stone cellar is lit only the torch light from the #stairs^.
root.hint: Geralt: "Poor kid. Hope the other prisoner is worth his loss."

exit.description: A set of uneven stone #stairs^ staggers upward.
exit.onCheck: Warmth and torch light flow down the #stairs^.

exit.description: Satisfied with your sacrifice the magical #gate^ clears away its red mist.
exit.onCheck: Eerie yellow light pours out of the open #gate^.

prop.description: The #nekker^ sprawls on the floor, vanquished by the thrust of your silver blade.
prop.onCheck: It haunts this world no more, though looking upon it still brings dread.

prop.description: Two wolf #carcasses^ now rest before the open #gate^.
prop.onCheck: One was stabbed several times. The other was felled with one swift thrust.
